pr_title: Fix wrong method name in ItemGroup.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change

timeline.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: also maybe note that the name is like on top of the inventory rows, so like that "Inventory" label in the inventory screens above the player inventory slots or that inventory custom name label above the item container's inventory slots
replies.author: liach

timeline.message: Describe where the name is rendered.
